Class Round

java.lang.Object
base.Round
public class Round extends Object
Represents a single round in the JEST game. Each round: deal 2 cards, make offers, take turns taking 1 card each. At end of round, each player has taken exactly 1 card to their Jest. Remaining offer cards stay on table until next round or final collection.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

  • Constructor Details

    • Round

      public Round(Deck deck, List<Player> players)
      Creates a new round.
      Parameters:
      deck - The deck to draw from
      players - The players participating

  • Method Details

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      Deals 2 cards to each player.

    • makeOffers

      public void makeOffers()
      Has each player make their offer (1 face-up, 1 face-down).

    • takeOffers

      public void takeOffers()
      Processes card taking phase according to JEST rules: 1. Player with highest face-up card goes first 2. Must take from ANOTHER player's complete offer 3. The player whose offer was taken from goes next 4. If that player already took, highest remaining face-up goes 5. Final player can take from own offer if it's the only complete one

    • getLeftoverCards

      public List<Card> getLeftoverCards()
      Gets the remaining cards from all offers (for next round preparation). Does NOT add them to Jest - they stay on table.
      Returns:
      List of remaining cards from offers

    • collectLeftoverCardsToJest

      public void collectLeftoverCardsToJest()
      Collects leftover cards into owners' Jests. Only called in the FINAL round when deck is empty.

    • prepareNextRound

      public void prepareNextRound()
      Prepares for the next round by clearing hands. Note: Offers are NOT cleared here - leftover cards handled by Game.

    • getOffers

      public List<Offer> getOffers()
      Gets the list of offers.
      Returns:
      List of offers

    • setOffers

      public void setOffers(List<Offer> offers)
      Sets the list of offers.
      Parameters:
      offers - List of offers to set
